Class SensorLogger

java.lang.Object
  ca.mcgill.hs.plugin.InputPlugin
      ca.mcgill.hs.plugin.SensorLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Plugin
public class SensorLogger
extends InputPlugin

An InputPlugin which gets data from the phone's available sensors.

Author:
Cicerone Cojocaru, Jonathan Pitre

Constructor Detail

SensorLogger

public SensorLogger(SensorManager sensorManager)
This is the basic constructor for the SensorLogger plugin. It has to be instantiated before it is started, and needs to be passed a reference to a SensorManager.

Parameters:
gpsm -
context -
Method Detail

startPlugin

public void startPlugin()
Registers the appropriate listeners using the SensorManager.

onSensorChanged

public void onSensorChanged(SensorEvent event)
This method gets called automatically whenever a sensor has changed.

Parameters:
event - the SensorEvent detailing the change in sensor data.

stopPlugin

public void stopPlugin()
Unregisters the appropriate listeners using the SensorManager.

onAccuracyChanged

public void onAccuracyChanged(Sensor sensor,
                              int accuracy)
This method gets called automatically whenever a Sensor's accuracy has changed.

Parameters:
sensor - the Sensor whose accuracy changed.
accuracy - the new accuracy of the given Sensor.
